definition: Badaling, a particular section of the Great Wall that is a favorite tourist destination
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent

sentences.english: Badaling is a hill about 1000 meters above sea level.
sentences.chinese: 八達嶺是一座海拔1000米左右的小山。

sentences.english: Badaling in Beijing, a forest carbon sink forest farms have formed.
sentences.chinese: 在北京的八達嶺，一個碳匯林林場已經成形。

sentences.english: President Barack Obama tours the Great Wall of China
sentences.chinese: 奧巴馬在北京西北方向的八達嶺長城上。

sentences.english: Today, I and my team would go to climb the Badaling Great Wall.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我和我的團隊就要去八達嶺爬長城啦。

sentences.english: Badaling is the best place to see the Great Wall snaking across the mountain ridges.
sentences.chinese: 八達嶺是觀看長城沿山脊蜿蜒行走最好的地方。

sentences.english: We are now climb the Badaling Great Wall.
sentences.chinese: 我們現在攀登的是八達嶺長城。

sentences.english: Badaling in Beijing, a jungle carbon sink jungle harvests have formed.
sentences.chinese: 在北京的八達嶺，一個碳匯林林場已經成形。

sentences.english: The stuff worth seeing is over at Badaling.
sentences.chinese: 真正值得一看的在八達嶺。

sentences.english: Badaling in Beijing, a forest carbon sink forest harvests have formed.
sentences.chinese: 在北京的八達嶺，一個碳匯林林場已經成形。

sentences.english: which is 85 kilometres north of Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 八達嶺位於北京以北50千米處。

sentences.english: And the Badaling Great Wall is the most representative one of the Great Wall.
sentences.chinese: 其中八達嶺長城是最具有代表性的一段長城。

sentences.english: The Badaling Great Wall turns off the ditch ancient road Beikou located at Beijing Yanqing County Jundu.
sentences.chinese: 八達嶺長城位於北京市延慶縣軍都山關溝古道北口。

sentences.english: Badaling in Beijing, a woods carbon sink forest farms have formed.
sentences.chinese: 在北京的八達嶺，一個碳匯林林場已經成形。

sentences.english: Badaling Great Wall and Ming Tomb are on the same route on the north suburb of Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 八達嶺長城和十三陵都在同一路線上的北北京近郊。

sentences.english: We took a car to Badaling, and mounted the Wall from there.
sentences.chinese: 我們坐車到八達嶺，從八達嶺登上長城。

sentences.english: We took a car to Badaling, and mounted the Wall from there.
sentences.chinese: 我們坐車到八達嶺，從八達嶺登上長城。

definition: Takeshima (Korean Dokdo 獨島|独岛[Du2 dao3]), disputed islands in Sea of Japan
Xizhimen neighborhood of Beijing/the main northwest gate of Beijing
ring road/circle line (e.g. rail or subway)
Yongdingmen, front gate of the outer section of Beijing's old city wall, torn down in the 1950s and reconstructed in 2005
